title: Create and maintain a sales order draft
purpose: Enter and maintain order header and line details before advancing workflow status.
whenToUse: You are creating a new order draft.
You are correcting header, line, or attachment data for an existing editable order.
prerequisites: Customer, site, and order date are available.
For line edits, the order is still in an editable state.
stepByStepActions: Complete required fields in Order Header.
Select Save Draft to persist header changes.
Add at least one order line with ordered quantity.
Review Validation Checklist before lifecycle advancement.
Upload relevant order attachments if required by policy.
expectedResult: Order is saved with current draft data and remains ready for role-based lifecycle progression.

commonErrorsAndRecovery.error: Customer, Site, and Order Date are required.
commonErrorsAndRecovery.cause: One or more mandatory fields are blank.
recovery: Fill each required field marked with an asterisk.

commonErrorsAndRecovery.cause: Server-side validation, connectivity, or transient backend failure.
recovery: Check field values for invalid data.
Escalate with the order ID and error time if issue persists.

knownLimitations: Customer detail page is currently a placeholder and does not provide full master-data edits.
escalationPath: Contact Office process owner first, then engineering support if behavior differs from spec.
